channel.title: Dropdown box? Help please!
channel.description:
How do I make a dropdown box for teleporting? (Like in Deltascape or Delta-based servers?)
I have too many teleports so I want to just do this.. VV
For example, you click a teleport that says PK and then it brings up a list-
Edgeville Magebank Varrok
How can I do this?
Please help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2008, 04:59:00 pm[/size][hr]help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2008, 05:33:26 pm[/size][hr]helpoeoeoe
